name: Nocturnal Enrichment
description:
This is the night you’ve been anticipating for a long time. Some of the richest people in your country will attend a party organized in your town. You weren’t necessarily invited, but will be going anyways. As a master of pickpocketing you’ll surely find a lot of reckless people with too much valuables in their possession - will you be kind enough to help them dispose of their baggage? Let the harvest night begin.

Carefully steal items from people while engaging in small-talk in order to keep their guard down. Don’t try anything suspicious! The hotels staff will be happy to have one guest less to serve. Keep up the conversation, no matter how ludicrous it may seem - sometimes too much wealth turns people into nuts!

Mouse is recommended.
